attributes.action: Stop the Government closing gyms in Greater Manchester
attributes.additional_details: Allow members to self police The processes put in place in the gyms - they can use the existing facilities to report any gyms that do not appear Covid safe
attributes.background: There is no evidence to suggest that gyms are a hot spot for Covid infections intact the surgery which UK Active undertook showed that less than 0.3% of positive cases could be linked to gyms Allow gyms to remain open if they have a risk assessment in place, Covid safe and no positive cases

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has confirmed that gyms in Manchester will not be required to close under Tier 3 restrictions.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554473
